CustomField.description: This optional field is manually selected. It is used to determine if the statistic is manually updated via a batch job. A manually updated statistic allows a user to initiate the recalculation. When enabled, the statistic is updated manually; when disabled the statistic does not update manually. It is disabled by default.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables manual calculation of the statistic. A manually updated statistic allows a user to initiate the recalculation.
CustomField.label: Enable Manual Calculation
